text: "Shivers" is a 2021 song by English singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran and is the second single from his fifth studio album =. It topped the single charts in Austria, Bulgaria, Germany, Ireland, Sweden, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. It went to number 2 in Australia, Belgium (Flanders), Canada, Croatia, Denmark, Finland, Lebanon and Slovakia, number 3 in Iceland, New Zealand, Norway, Poland and Singapore, number 4 in Belgium (Wallonia), Luxembourg and the United States, number 5 in the Czech Republic and number 6 in the Netherlands and Romania. == References == Category:2021 songs Category:Ed Sheeran songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Shivers (Ed Sheeran song)
